questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Urban construction and development
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A calm beach scene
B) A bustling market
C) An ongoing construction site surrounded by high rise buildings
D) A family picnic

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A construction site with high-rise buildings
C) A natural landscape
D) A wildlife scene

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A park
B) A large tree
C) Construction barriers with graffiti
D) A river

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Skyscrapers and high-rise buildings
C) A forest
D) The ocean

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A wooden fence with graffiti
B) A lake
C) A playground
D) A car

What can be seen flying in the sky?
A) An airplane
B) A bird
C) A kite
D) A drone

What is written on the wooden fence?
A) A welcome message
B) Graffiti with the word "ISAE"
C) A historical note
D) An advertisement

What type of buildings are seen in the background?
A) Historical monuments
B) High-rise residential and commercial buildings
C) Small houses
D) Industrial warehouses

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Gray and cloudy
B) Blue and clear
C) Red and sunset
D) Dark and stormy

What is the surface of the ground in the photo?
A) Grass
B) Pavement or asphalt
C) Sand
D) Snow

What kind of vehicle is partially visible in the photo?
A) A bicycle
B) A truck trailer
C) A car
D) A motorcycle

What is the state of the posters on the wooden fence?
A) Brand new
B) Torn and partially visible
C) Completely intact
D) Nonexistent

A) Decoration
B) Safety barrier for a construction site
C) Advertisement board
D) Playground boundary

What is the architectural style of the buildings?
A) Gothic
B) Modern and contemporary
C) Victorian
D) Colonial

A) Clean and well-maintained
B) Cracked and some water/mud on few parts
C) Covered in snow
D) Flooded

What does the graffiti on the wooden fence spell out?
A) A person's name
B) The word "ISAE"
C) A motivational quote
D) A warning

A) Lifting construction materials
B) Decoration
C) Filming a movie
D) Conducting a survey

What is the primary material of the fence in the foreground?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Plastic
D) Stone

A) A bulldozer
B) A crane

A) A parade
B) A protest
C) Construction work
D) A festival

A) Red
B) Blue and glassy
C) Yellow
D) Green

A) It is a rural area
B) It is an urban area
C) It is a suburban area
D) It is a forest area

A) Wood
B) Glass, Brick and concrete/ bricks

D) Stone

What type of area is depicted in the photo?
A) Industrial zone
B) Residential and commercial zone
C) Agricultural land

A) Perched on a tree
B) Flying
C) Nesting
D) Swimming

What is the condition of the posters on the wooden fence?
A) New and intact
B) Old and torn
C) Missing
D) Painted over

What can be inferred about the city's development?
A) It is declining
B) It is rapidly growing
C) It is stagnant

A) Low
